alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 1:24AM AKST until January 21 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Southwest winds 15 to 30 mph over the highway summits will reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Central Interior. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...1 to 3 inches of snowfall accumulation is expected. Significant blowing and drifting of snow is expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
